name: HellJump: Welcome to Hell
description:
❒ Featured by Apple in "New and Noteworthy"
❒ "What's Hot" games. Jumping HellMan!
This is a simple jump game (like d**dl* jump)

✭HOW TO PLAY✭
✔ Tilt to move left or right.
✔ Tap the screen to shoot.

_____________
Touch Arcade:

"well, i admit i came into the thread to say i'd had enough of all these doodle jump clones, but im am shocked. it's just so beautiful!"

"Glad to hear it's in review. I'll keep an eye on it."

"I'm getting tired of these types of games but this one looks like it has a lot of potential. I'll be checking this one out!"
